General.Name: Korshunovskii GOK
General.Description: Korshynov Mining Plant Public Joint Stock Company engages in the mining of iron ore in Russia. It operates Korshunovsky open pit, Rudnogorsky open pit, and Korshunovsky concentrating plant. The company was founded in 1955 and is based in Zheleznogorsk, Russia. Korshynov Mining Plant Public Joint Stock Company operates as a subsidiary of Mechel PAO.
